item.title: Inbound Ssl in Bluemix
item.description: Did you know in Bluemix you get inbound SSL for free? It is automatically turned on and enabled for every app. All you have to do is just access your app over https instead of http. Developers donâ€™t need to implement SSL in their app, you just need to support HTTP and the Bluemix infrastructure will support HTTPS for you and do SSL offloading. Additionally Bluemix supports the x-forwarded-proto header to allow developers to check with protocol requests are coming in over.
